certificates.title: Data Scientist Master's Program
certificates.description: This is to certify that Konada Narendra Neeraj has successfully graduated from the Data Scientist Master's Program offered by Simplilearn. The program covered a range of data science topics, including statistical analysis, data visualization, machine learning, and predictive modeling. Konada completed all mandated course requirements and demonstrated a deep understanding of the subject matter through the completion of industry-relevant projects. This certificate is a testament to Konada's commitment to learning and expertise in the field of data science. The program was completed on February 6, 2024, and the certificate can be verified at Data Science course Certificate. The CEO of Simplilearn, Krishna Kumar, awarded this certificate.

certificates.title: Another Certificate
certificates.description: This is the detailed description of another certificate. It contains more information about the course and the achievement.

certificates.title: C Programming
certificates.description: I have completed the Programming in 'C' course from Firstman Academy, an ISO 9001:2015 certified company. I received an A++ grade in the examination conducted after the course completion. The course covered various topics in programming, and I had the opportunity to learn and practice them. I am grateful to the Firstman Academy team for their support and guidance throughout the course. As per the certificate, I attended the course from 01-09-2021 to 09-10-2021 at the Firstman Academy Visakhapatnam Center. I secured an A++ grade, which is above 86% of the total marks.

certificates.title: Python Programming
certificates.description: I have successfully completed the Python Scripting program with an A++ grade from Firstman Academy, an ISO 9001:2015 certified company. The course covered various topics in Python programming, and I received an A++ grade in the examination conducted after the course completion. I would like to thank the Firstman Academy team for their support and guidance throughout the program. As per the certificate, I attended the program from 01-11-2021 to 15-12-2021 at the Firstman Academy Visakhapatnam Center and earned an A++ grade, which is above 86% of the total marks.

certificates.title: IBM Python for Data Science Certification
certificates.description: I have successfully completed and received a passing grade in the Python for Data Science course offered by IBM and Simplilearn. The course covered various topics in Python programming and focused on using Python for data science applications. The course was provided by IBM and hosted on Simplilearn's skillsnet platform. I would like to express my gratitude to IBM and Simplilearn for offering this course and for providing me with the opportunity to expand my knowledge and skills in Python programming and data science. Authenticity of this certificate can be verified by visiting the following link: IBM Python course Certificate .

certificates.title: Java Course Certificate
certificates.description: I have successfully completed the Java course by demonstrating theoretical and practical understanding of Java. The course was completed on Sololearn and the certificate number is CT-8TWEMLGL. The certificate was issued on 22 February, 2023. I would like to express my gratitude to Sololearn and Yeva Hyusyan, Chief Executive Officer, for offering this course and for providing me with the opportunity to expand my knowledge and skills in Java.

certificates.title: Certification in Data Science with Python
certificates.description: I have successfully completed the Data Science with Python training program on Simplilearn. The program included one passed project and a passed test. The certificate was issued on 27th November, 2023 and the certificate code is 4675786. We would like to express our gratitude to Krishna Kumar, CEO of Simplilearn, for offering this training program and for providing us with the opportunity to expand our knowledge and skills in Data Science with Python.

certificates.title: Certification in Python for Data Science
certificates.description: I have successfully completed the Python for Data Science training program on Simplilearn. The certificate was issued on 21st October, 2023 and the certificate code is 4592757. We would like to express our gratitude to Krishna Kumar, CEO of Simplilearn, for offering this training program and for providing us with the opportunity to expand our knowledge and skills in Python for Data Science.

certificates.title: Certification in Salesforce Developer Virtual Internship
certificates.description: I have successfully completed the Salesforce Developer Virtual Internship by demonstrating theoretical and practical understanding of Salesforce development. The internship was conducted in partnership with Salesforce and SmartBridge, and was hosted on SmartInternz's platform. The certificate was issued on 7th February, 2024 and the certificate code is SISFVIPAD2024-90917. During the 8-week period of the virtual internship (November 2023 - January 2024), I have completed various Salesforce Trailhead modules, including Types Of Flows & Security, Apex, Testing & Debugging, VS Code Setup & CLI Setup, Lightning Web Components (LWC) & API, and Super Badges. We would like to express our gratitude to SmartBridge, SmartInternz, and Amarender Katkam, Founder & CEO, for offering this virtual internship and for providing us with the opportunity to expand our knowledge and skills in Salesforce development. The authenticity of this certificate can be verified by visiting the following link: Salesforce Developer Virtual Internship Certificate .

certificates.title: Certification in IBC Alt Hack Participation
certificates.description: I was awarded a Certificate of Participation for the IBC Alt Hack event. The event was held on 23rd December 2022 at GVPCE, Vizag, Andhra Pradesh, and was organized by IBC Media in partnership with various organizations. I have participated in the event and demonstrated his dedication and efforts towards technology and skill development. The certificate is presented to appreciate my participation and efforts.

certificates.title: IIT Bhubaneswar Wissenaire 23
certificates.description: I successfully completed the AI & ML workshop at Wissenaire¹23, the Annual Techno-Management Fest of Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bhubaneswar. The workshop provided me with hands-on experience with various tools and techniques in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I would like to thank the organizers, including Shishir Reddy, the Chief Co-ordinator, and Dr. Srikanth Gollapudi, the Chair Person, for their dedication and hard work in making the event a success. I am honored to have been a part of Wissenaire¹23 and look forward to applying what I have learned to my future projects and endeavors.

certificates.title: Google DevFest 2023
certificates.description: I had a great learning experience as an active participant in Google DevFest 2023, organized by Google Developer Groups (GDG) Vizag. The event featured sessions, workshops, and keynotes from Google experts and industry leaders, covering topics such as mobile development, web, AI, and cloud computing. I was able to connect with other developers in my local community and learn from their experiences. The hands-on demos and workshops were an excellent opportunity to learn and build with Google technologies. I appreciated the emphasis on solutions that sync with both Google products and the broader developer tool ecosystem. I want to thank the organizers of GDG Vizag for their hard work and dedication in putting together this fantastic event. Overall, my experience at Google DevFest 2023 was incredibly rewarding and fulfilling. I would recommend this event to any developer looking to learn, connect, and collaborate with other developers.

certificates.title: Frost Hacks 2024
certificates.description: I received a Certificate of Participation for my outstanding performance in Frost Hacks 2024, a hackathon organized by IARE in association with Major League Hacking. The event took place on 20-21st January 2024 and brought together many talented and enthusiastic participants. During the hackathon, I had the opportunity to showcase my coding skills, collaborate with other developers, and work on innovative projects. The event was supported by various sponsors, including Hedera, Taipy, STAND, Streamlit, Master, coding, Security, tonkysio, Cloudflare, Catalog, GoDaddy Registry, Advantage Community, MLH, and Major League Hacking. I would like to express my gratitude to the organizers, including Dr. L.V Narasimha Prasad, the Principal of IARE, Dr. B. Padmaja, the Dean of CDC, Lumpravend, Narendra, and Khushi Mahawar, the MLH Coach, for their dedication and hard work in making the event a success. Receiving this Certificate of Participation is a testament to my commitment to learning, collaboration, and innovation in the field of software development. I am proud to have been a part of Frost Hacks 2024 and look forward to participating in future hackathons.

certificates.title: Java (Basic) HackerRank
certificates.description: I have received a HackerRank Certificate of Completion for successfully clearing the assessment for the skill Java (Basic). The assessment took place on 22nd February 2023 and was supported by HackerRank, a technology hiring platform that is used by businesses to evaluate the skills of potential candidates. The assessment evaluated my understanding and proficiency in Java (Basic), and I am proud to have successfully completed it. The certificate serves as a testament to my skills and knowledge in this area. I would like to express my gratitude to HackerRank and the CTO, Harishankaran K, for providing me with this opportunity to demonstrate my skills and for recognizing my efforts with this certificate. This achievement motivates me to continue learning and improving my skills in Java and other programming languages.

The assessment took place on 31st October 2022 and was supported by HackerRank, a technology hiring platform that is used by businesses to evaluate the skills of potential candidates. The assessment evaluated my understanding and proficiency in Python (Basic), and I am proud to have successfully completed it. The certificate serves as a testament to my skills and knowledge in this area. I would like to express my gratitude to HackerRank and the CTO, Harishankaran K, for providing me with this opportunity to demonstrate my skills and for recognizing my efforts with this certificate. This achievement motivates me to continue learning and improving my skills in Python and other programming languages.

certificates.title: NASA
certificates.description: I am honored to share that I was offered the opportunity to attend the NASA conference in Los Angeles at the age of 16 to represent my outstanding project. This recognition is a testament to my hard work, dedication, and passion for space exploration and design. Although I was unable to attend the conference, I am grateful to NASA for recognizing my achievements and offering me this opportunity. The experience was both inspiring and enriching, and I am proud to have been considered for this recognition. Receiving this certificate of recognition is a testament to my potential in the field of space exploration and design. Although I was unable to attend the conference, I am committed to continuing to pursue my interests and passions in this field.

certificates.title: IGIAT1
certificates.description: I have successfully completed the AI with Python Programming training program at the Indo-German Institute of Advanced Technology. The program took place from 15th May 2023 to 03rd June 2023, and I am proud to have been a part of it. During the training, I had the opportunity to learn about various subject matters, including UI & UX Designing & Development, Developing a Server, Flask Server using MVT Model, Central Server using MVC Model, Protocols Study and Real-time Application in Communications, STAR Design and Development of Central Server Dashboard for both client and Admin Access, and ML Model Generation for Predicting circuit damages. The Indo-German Institute of Advanced Technology is a prestigious institution, and I am grateful for the opportunity to have learned from their experienced faculty. I am confident that the skills and knowledge I acquired during this training program will be beneficial for my future endeavors. Receiving this certificate of completion is a testament to my dedication and hard work throughout the program. I am proud to have completed this training program and look forward to continuing to pursue my interests and passions in the field of AI and Python programming.

certificates.title: IGIAT2
certificates.description: I have successfully completed the Internship Training Program on Artificial Intelligence (AI) with Python at the Indo German Institute of Advanced Technology. The program took place from 15/05/2023 to 03/06/2023, and I am proud to have been a part of it. During the internship, I had the opportunity to work on various projects and tasks related to Artificial Intelligence using Python. I am grateful for the guidance and support provided by the faculty and staff at Indo German Institute of Advanced Technology, which helped me enhance my skills and knowledge in this field. Receiving this certificate of completion is a testament to my dedication and hard work throughout the internship period. I am proud to have completed this program and look forward to continuing to pursue my interests and passions in the field of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Engineering.

certificates.title: Rinex
certificates.description: I have successfully completed the Artificial Intelligence program at Rinex Technology. The program took place from 10 Mar 2022 to 23 May 2022, and I am proud to have been a part of it. During the program, I had the opportunity to learn about various concepts and techniques in Artificial Intelligence and apply them to real-world problems. I am grateful for the guidance and support provided by the faculty and staff at Rinex Technology, which helped me enhance my skills and knowledge in this field. Receiving this certificate of completion is a testament to my dedication and hard work throughout the program. I am proud to have completed this program and look forward to continuing to pursue my interests and passions in the field of Artificial Intelligence.
